snippet: Whether sticking to religious themes, or working in touches from a favorite TV show, variety appears to be emphasis for many couples.
abstract: More couples are moving past traditional wedding ceremonies, adopting many quirky, personal and even pop-cultural touches for their special day.
lead_paragraph: Whether sticking to religious themes, or working in touches from a favorite TV show, variety appears to be emphasis for many couples.

headline.seo: Weddings Move Past Traditional, in Some Cases, to Science Fictional
headline.main: Moving Past Traditional to the Science Fictional
headline.print_headline: Moving Past Traditional To the Science Fictional
